div.h3: Reviews created for galendea for sprint Donegal 2
div.p: This gives a way to access review timelines, see revisions, see files, see comments, apply/reference key word indicators.

tr.td: FAB-2711: OCOccupation, OCWorkPatternCalendar and OCWorkCalendar data model updates.
FAB-2709 Change data model to hold the Occupation/Employment selected in the intake.
FAB-2578 Create party case role in the facade to delegate in the internal method
FAB-1988 Create operations to enable and disable jboss datasources
FAB-2674: Updated method name to be align with Fineos naming convention.
FAB-2907: Added new JSP to move the Work Calendar for Absence.
FAB-2760: Updated OccupationDetailsWidget according to the latest DM changes (WorkCalendar split).
FAB-2578 Logic for widget for intake step JSP
FAB-2578 Make OccupationDetailsWidget available available to other applications using the OccupationDetailsProxy
FAB-2939: Set the LeaveRequest\'s Start and End Date
FAB-2759: Moved enums to a better location due to the split of layers in frontoffice.
FAB-2948 Hide OccupationCode from the OccupationListviewWidget
FAB-2578 In selection mode, only have default selection if 1 row.
FAB-2838: Intake process - record whether the employer is notified.
FAB-1988: Fix the build: test ignored.
